about.title: International College of IT and Business
about.subtitle: Strategic alliance of three leading universities for training world-class IT specialists
about.description1: Salymbekov University, Lincoln University (Malaysia) and INTI University (Malaysia) have joined forces to create a unique educational platform combining the best international practices in IT education.
about.description2: The International College of Information Technology and Business offers modern educational programs developed considering the requirements of the global IT market and implemented in Russian and English languages.
about.description3: Graduates receive two diplomas - national and international standard, achieve English proficiency level corresponding to TOEFL/IELTS standards, and study under leading specialists from three partner countries.

collegeDirector.welcome: Welcome to our new college, International College of IT and Business!
collegeDirector.transition: Transition is never easy, whether it's school, college, university or any other practical stage of life.
collegeDirector.understanding: As a teacher and parent, I understand that these years are very exciting times when children enter new life channels, explore themselves, their talents and their profession.

teamwork.title: We are a team
teamwork.description: It's a great honor for me to be part of this team. We are family. We need to work as one team. Either it's us, or nobody. It's all for one and one for all.

communication.title: Open Communication
communication.description: If you have ideas, tips or problems, then please come and discuss. Communication is key to any successful relationships. Please don't hesitate to come up with new ideas and methods.

priority.title: Our Priority

news.title: News and Events
news.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest events of our university
news.author: Press Service

1.title: Opening of New IT Building
1.excerpt: We are pleased to announce the opening of a new modern building equipped with advanced technologies for training future IT specialists.

2.title: Partnership with Lincoln University
2.excerpt: Signing double diploma agreement with Lincoln University Malaysia opens new opportunities for our students.

3.title: Students Won Hackathon
3.excerpt: Our team took first place in international mobile application development hackathon.

1.title: New Study Programs
1.excerpt: Introducing new specializations in artificial intelligence and cybersecurity.

2.title: Open Day
2.excerpt: Inviting applicants and parents to open day on January 25.

3.title: Scholarships for Gifted
3.excerpt: Announcing competition for scholarships for talented students.

4.title: Master Class from Google
4.excerpt: Google experts will conduct series of master classes on mobile development.

5.title: IT Conference 2024
5.excerpt: Preparing for annual international IT conference with leading specialists participation.

6.title: Laboratory Updates
6.excerpt: Completed modernization of computer laboratories with new equipment.

1.content:
We are pleased to announce the opening of a new modern building equipped with advanced technologies for training future IT specialists. The new building includes:

• 10 modern computer classes
• Virtual reality laboratories
• Coworking zones for project work
• Conference hall for 200 people

The building infrastructure allows conducting education according to international standards. Students will get access to the most modern equipment and software.

2.content:
Signing double diploma agreement with Lincoln University Malaysia opens new opportunities for our students. Within the partnership:

• Students can get two diplomas simultaneously
• Student and teacher exchange
• Joint research projects
• Credit recognition between universities

This partnership strengthens our international connections and provides students with unique opportunities for global education.

3.content:
Our team took first place in international mobile application development hackathon. The winning project - smart city management application that includes:

• Transport monitoring system
• Smart energy consumption management
• Platform for civil initiatives

Students showed outstanding skills in programming, design and engineering. This achievement confirms high quality of our education.

4.content:
Introducing new specializations in artificial intelligence and cybersecurity. New programs include:

• Machine learning and data analysis
• Information systems protection
• Ethical hacking
• Neural networks and deep learning

Programs are developed considering requirements of modern IT market and include practical classes with real cases.

5.content:
Inviting applicants and parents to open day on January 25. Program includes:

• Meeting teachers
• Campus tour
• Student master classes
• Admission consultations
• Educational programs presentation

This is great opportunity to learn more about our college and ask all interested questions.

6.content:
Announcing competition for scholarships for talented students. Scholarships cover:

• 100% tuition for 5 students
• 50% tuition for 10 students
• 25% tuition for 20 students

To participate, submit application by February 1 and pass competitive selection including testing and interview.

admission.title: Admission Committee
admission.subtitle: Your path to successful IT education starts here

welcomeMessage.p1: Salymbekov University is pleased to welcome you in the new academic year and happily opens its doors for you. The university is a modern innovative educational institution.
welcomeMessage.p2: Founded in 2019, as continuation of educational activities of Askar Salymbekov Foundation, Salymbekov university has all resources for training qualified specialists.
welcomeMessage.p3: The university pays great attention to extracurricular activities of students. Students actively participate in ENACTUS project, IT events and Business school trainings.

innovative.description: Modern educational institution with advanced learning technologies

foundation.description: Founded in 2019 with rich educational traditions

specialties.subtitle: Choose direction that matches your interests and career goals

cta.title: Can't choose direction?
cta.description: Schedule consultation and our specialists will help you choose suitable program

computerScience.title: Computer Science
computerScience.shortDescription: Discover exciting world of computer science, studying programming, artificial intelligence, databases and much more.
computerScience.about: Computer Science program offers students in-depth study of theory and practice necessary for creating innovative software solutions. Our goal is to prepare specialists capable of solving complex tasks, developing software and working in interdisciplinary teams.

foundations.title: Programming Fundamentals
foundations.description: Master basic programming concepts like syntax, logic and algorithms. Perfect for beginners.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Immersion in AI and machine learning technologies. Learn how to create intelligent systems and applications.

web.title: Web Application Development
web.description: Learn to create dynamic websites and applications using popular programming languages and frameworks.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Master application development for iOS and Android using modern technologies and methodologies.

multimedia.title: Multimedia Programs
multimedia.shortDescription: Discover world of multimedia technologies! Programs that combine art and technology, creating incredible visual and audiovisual projects.
multimedia.about:
Our multimedia technologies program offers deep immersion in creation of audiovisual materials, 3D modeling, animation and much more. The program allows students to master tools used by modern designers and animators for creating interactive media products.

You will study: design basics, work with video and audio, creation of interactive applications, use of virtual and augmented reality technologies.

design.title: Design and Animation
design.description: Master basics of graphic design and animation. Learn to create amazing 2D and 3D animations that attract attention.

video.title: Video Editing and Post-production
video.description: Learn to edit video, add visual effects and work with editing programs. Become professional in creating clips for cinema and television.

vr.title: Virtual Reality
vr.description: Learn how to create content for virtual reality. Work with technologies that create fully immersive experience.

ar.title: Augmented Reality
ar.description: Study principles of augmented reality and learn to implement digital objects in real world using modern tools.

mobileDevelopment.title: Mobile Development
mobileDevelopment.shortDescription: Learn how to create mobile applications for iOS and Android using the most modern technologies.
mobileDevelopment.about: Mobile development is one of the most demanded and dynamically developing branches of IT. With growing popularity of smartphones, tablets and other mobile devices, ability to create applications for iOS and Android becomes crucial skill for IT specialists.

foundations.title: Mobile Development Fundamentals
foundations.description: Study basic principles of mobile development for iOS and Android, and get acquainted with tools necessary for starting work.

reactNative.title: React Native Development
reactNative.description: Master cross-platform mobile application development using React Native framework.

ios.title: iOS Development with Swift
ios.description: Study Swift programming language and learn to create native applications for iPhone and iPad.

android.title: Android Development with Kotlin
android.description: Study Kotlin - main language for Android application development, and start creating your own projects.

college.title: International College of IT and Business
college.subtitle: Structural subdivision of Salymbekov University - preparation of secondary education specialists in IT

about.title: About College
about.description1: Main task of the college is preparation of secondary (vocational-technical) education specialists in IT.
about.description2: Student admission is conducted after 9th and 11th grades. Students receive two diplomas upon graduation - Kyrgyz and international standard.
about.description3: Double diploma program is implemented in cooperation with Lincoln University (Malaysia).
about.description4: Education is conducted in Russian and English languages with strong emphasis on practice.

doubleDiploma.title: Double Diploma
doubleDiploma.description: Diplomas of Kyrgyz and international standard from Lincoln University (Malaysia)

international.title: International Cooperation
international.description: Possibility of partial study in Malaysia and international diploma recognition

practical.title: Practical Orientation
practical.description: Creation of real projects from first courses: websites, mobile applications and much more

teachers.title: Experienced Teachers
teachers.description: Specialists from IT companies and teachers from Kyrgyzstan and Malaysia

pricing.title: Tuition Fees
pricing.note: Cost may change, check with admission committee

computerScience.title: Computer Science
computerScience.shortDescription: Discover the exciting world of computer science by learning programming, artificial intelligence, databases, and much more.

about.title: About the Program
about.content: The 'Computer Science' program offers students an in-depth study of theory and practice necessary for creating innovative software solutions. Our goal is to train professionals capable of solving complex problems, developing software, and working in interdisciplinary teams.

foundations.title: Programming Fundamentals
foundations.description: Master the basic concepts of programming such as syntax, logic, and algorithms. Perfect for beginners.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Dive into AI and machine learning technologies. Learn how to create intelligent systems and applications.

web.title: Web Application Development
web.description: Learn to build dynamic websites and applications using popular programming languages and frameworks.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Master mobile app development for iOS and Android using modern tools and methodologies.

admission.title: How to Apply
admission.description: To apply for the 'Computer Science' program, submit your application through our online portal. We welcome students of all skill levels.

multimedia.title: Multimedia Programs
multimedia.shortDescription: Discover the world of multimedia technologies! Programs that unite art and technology to create stunning visual and audiovisual projects.

about.title: About the Program
about.content1: Our multimedia technology program offers deep immersion into the creation of audiovisual materials, 3D modeling, animation, and more. Students gain hands-on experience with the tools used by modern designers and animators to create interactive media products.
about.content2: You will study the fundamentals of design, video and audio production, interactive applications, and technologies for virtual and augmented reality.

courses.title: Courses
courses.subtitle: Explore the world of creative technologies

design.title: Design and Animation
design.description: Master the basics of graphic design and animation. Learn to create impressive 2D and 3D animations that capture attention.

video.title: Video Editing and Post-production
video.description: Learn to edit videos, add visual effects, and work with professional editing software. Become an expert in creating videos for film and television.

vr.title: Virtual Reality
vr.description: Discover how to create content for virtual reality and work with technologies that deliver immersive experiences.

ar.title: Augmented Reality
ar.description: Learn the principles of augmented reality and how to integrate digital objects into the real world using modern tools.

admission.title: How to Apply
admission.description: To apply for the multimedia technology program, submit your application through our online portal. We will review your creative portfolio and conduct an interview.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.shortDescription: Learn how to create mobile applications for iOS and Android using the latest technologies.

about.title: About the Profession
about.content: Mobile development is one of the most in-demand and rapidly growing fields in IT. With the increasing popularity of smartphones, tablets, and other mobile devices, the ability to create apps for iOS and Android has become an essential skill for IT specialists.

courses.title: Courses
courses.subtitle: Choose your path in mobile development

foundations.title: Mobile Development Fundamentals
foundations.description: Learn the core principles of mobile development for iOS and Android, and get familiar with the tools you need to start building apps.

reactNative.title: React Native Development
reactNative.description: Master cross-platform mobile development using the React Native framework.

ios.title: iOS Development with Swift
ios.description: Learn the Swift programming language and build native applications for iPhone and iPad.

android.title: Android Development with Kotlin
android.description: Learn Kotlin, the main language for Android app development, and start building your own projects.

admission.title: How to Apply
admission.description: Join our Mobile Development program and start your career in a fast-growing, high-tech field. Apply online and begin learning today!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to most popular questions about admission, studies and college life

contact.title: Didn't Find Answer?
contact.description: Contact us directly - we are always ready to help and answer all your questions

questions.question: 1. What specialties does college offer?
questions.answer: College offers three main IT specialist training directions: software development, mobile application development (iOS, Android, Flutter), multimedia application development (VFX design, Adobe Premiere Pro, etc.).

questions.question: 2. How to complete registration process?
questions.answer: For admission, contact admission committee by phones: +996 778 99 88 89 or +996 706 99 88 89, or send request to email info@salymbekov.com. Applicant admission is conducted based on 9 and 11 grades.

questions.question: 3. Is there possibility of getting scholarships?
questions.answer: College regularly conducts competitions offering discounts up to 100% on tuition. Also our students have opportunity to study free in semester programs in Malaysia and Korea. These programs allow students to study in foreign educational institutions, expanding their academic experience and cultural horizons.

questions.question: 4. What employment opportunities does college provide?
questions.answer: College cooperates with leading IT companies, and teachers are active developers, which promotes practice-oriented learning and increases employment chances of graduates.

questions.question: 5. What is tuition cost in college?
questions.answer: Tuition cost depends on chosen program and conditions. For current information, contact admission committee by indicated contacts.

questions.question: 6. What additional services does college provide?
questions.answer: College offers education in English language, which opens opportunities for international cooperation and employment. Also competitions and events for students are conducted, aimed at developing professional skills.

questions.question: 7. How does college support educational process?
questions.answer: Education is conducted according to modern programs using advanced material-technical base. Teachers are practicing specialists, which ensures relevance and practical orientation of education.

questions.question: 8. Is it possible to study abroad?
questions.answer: Yes, double diploma program provides education both in Kyrgyzstan and Malaysia. Students who completed 11 grades study 1 year in Kyrgyzstan and 1.5 years in Malaysia; completed 9 grades - 2 years in Kyrgyzstan and 1.5 years in Malaysia.

questions.question: 9. How are students assessed?
questions.answer: Information about student assessment system is not indicated on official website. Recommend clarifying details with admission committee or teaching staff.

questions.question: 10. What languages can be studied in college?
questions.answer: Main education is conducted in Russian and English languages. Special attention is paid to English language study for achieving TOEFL/IELTS level.

questions.question: 11. How can students participate in college public life?
questions.answer: College organizes various competitions and events aimed at developing professional and personal skills of students.

questions.question: 12. How does college help students develop leadership skills?
questions.answer: Trainings and master classes are conducted, aimed at developing leadership qualities and personal growth.

admissionRules.title: Rules and Admission Plan
admissionRules.subtitle: All necessary information for admission to Salymbekov University

rules.title: Admission Rules
rules.description: For admission to Salymbekov University, applicants need to meet following requirements and provide necessary document package.

stage1.description: Document acceptance from applicants in online and offline format

it.name: Information Technologies
it.requirements: Mathematics, computer science, English language. Technical interview.

business.name: Business Management
business.requirements: Mathematics, social studies, English language. Interview.

important.title: Important Information
important.description1: All documents must be provided in original or certified copy. Admission committee reserves right to verify authenticity of provided documents.
important.description2: For foreign citizens, additional requirements are provided. Detailed information check in international department.

selectionSchedule.title: Selection and Enrollment Schedule
selectionSchedule.subtitle: Salymbekov University conducts applicant selection and enrollment strictly in accordance with the rules and regulations of the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic
selectionSchedule.description: Every year, the schedule of selection rounds for the 2024-2025 academic year is prepared and published

notes.note1: Registration is conducted exclusively through the official university website
notes.note2: Full set of documents is required to participate
notes.note3: Results of each round are published within 3 working days
notes.note4: Applicants may participate in only one selection round
